title: Competency-Based Elective Education Modules in Emergency Medicine

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Medical Knowledge and Emergency Situation Recognition Skills
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented digital learning environment with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Enhancement of practical application skills for core emergency medicine procedures (patient triage, life-threatening situation management)
Acquisition of systematic patient assessment capabilities (medical history taking, physical examination) according to emergency care protocols
Establishment and demonstration of feasibility for self-directed learning strategies based on the ADDIE model
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
